thread.section_title: Arts and Entertainment coverage for all ages and interests - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Dance troupe marks 30 years of expressing emotions through hula
thread.title_full: Dance troupe marks 30 years of expressing emotions through hula - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Allan Ulrich
title: Dance troupe marks 30 years of expressing emotions through hula
text:
Photo: Courtesy Of Na Lei Hulu Patrick Makuakane,founding artistic director of Na Lei Hulu I Ka Wekiu dances in a recent company production.The troupe will celebrate its 30th anniversary show at the Palace of Fine Arts Theater through Sunday, Oct. 25. Photo: Courtesy of Na Lei Hulu Patrick Makuakane,founding artistic director of Na Lei Hulu I Ka...
Given enough artistry and marketing flair, a professional dance company can survive for perhaps 30 years. But when a troupe that is fueled by talent, goodwill and community spirit rather than money endures and prospers for three decades, you suspect there’s a bit of magic involved. Patrick Makuakane,founding artistic director of Na Lei Hulu I Ka Wekiu dances in a recent company production.The troupe will celebrate its 30th anniversary show at the Palace of Fine Arts Theater through Sunday, Oct. 25. Photo: Courtesy of Na Lei Hulu Patrick Makuakane,founding artistic director of Na Lei Hulu I Ka...
Given enough artistry and marketing flair, a professional dance company can survive for perhaps 30 years. But when a troupe that is fueled by talent, goodwill and community spirit rather than money endures and prospers for three decades, you suspect there’s a bit of magic involved.
